Package socialmagnet.social

Class Text

java.lang.Object
socialmagnet.social.Text
Direct Known Subclasses:
Post, Reply
public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
This Class represents text that can be posted onto the Social Magnet. It is the parent class of Post and Reply classes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Text​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String posterUsername, java.lang.String receiverUsername)
    Creates a new Text object with the specified message, poster's username and receiver's username
